languages.text: {n}Поднявшийся было на палубе ропот обрывает издевательский окрик Маражая.{/n} "Что, есть добровольцы стать первыми в нашем пиршестве?" {n}Когда люди испуганно затихают, друкари бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Я начну готовиться. Отдай приказы. Нас ждет... нечто незабываемое".

{n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."
languages.original_text: {n}Поднявшийся было на палубе ропот обрывает издевательский окрик Маражая.{/n} "Что, есть добровольцы стать первыми в нашем пиршестве?" {n}Когда люди испуганно затихают, друкари бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Я начну готовиться. Отдай приказы. Нас ждет... нечто незабываемое".

Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋有意提高声音，一开口就镇住了甲板上的窃窃私语。{/n}“那么，有谁愿意做这场盛宴的第一个志愿者吗？”{n}看着船员们噤若寒蝉的模样，玛拉斋又转向了你。{/n}“我要开始准备了。下令吧，这绝对会是场……令人难忘的盛宴。”
languages.original_text: {n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋有意提高声音，一开口就镇住了甲板上的窃窃私语。{/n}“那么，有谁愿意做这场盛宴的第一个志愿者吗？”{n}看着船员们噤若寒蝉的模样，玛拉斋又转向了你。{/n}“我要开始准备了。下令吧，这绝对会是场……令人难忘的盛宴。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El grito burlón de Marazhai interrumpe los murmullos de la cubierta:{/n} «Bueno, ¿alguien se ofrece voluntario como entrante de nuestro festín?». {n}Un silencio sepulcral se apodera de la tripulación, y Marazhai se vuelve para mirarte.{/n} «Empezaré los preparativos. Tú da la orden. Este ágape será... inolvidable».
languages.original_text: {n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."

traits.locale_text: {n}El grito burlón de Marazhai interrumpe los murmullos de la cubierta:{/n} «Bueno, ¿alguien se ofrece voluntario como entrante de nuestro festín?». {n}Un silencio sepulcral se apodera de la tripulación, y Marazhai se vuelve para mirarte.{/n} «Empezaré los preparativos. Tú da la orden. Este ágape será... inolvidable».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les murmures de la foule sont interrompus par le rire moqueur de Marazhai :{/n} « Y a-t-il des volontaires pour débuter notre festin ? » {n}Tandis qu'un silence terrifié s'abat sur le pont, Marazhai se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Je vais me préparer. Donnez les ordres nécessaires. Nous allons passer un moment... inoubliable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les murmures de la foule sont interrompus par le rire moqueur de Marazhai :{/n} « Y a-t-il des volontaires pour débuter notre festin ? » {n}Tandis qu'un silence terrifié s'abat sur le pont, Marazhai se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Je vais me préparer. Donnez les ordres nécessaires. Nous allons passer un moment... inoubliable. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Geflüster an Deck hört auf, da Marazhai spöttisch herumschreit:{/n} "Gibt es hier Freiwillige für unser Fest?" {n}Die Crew verfällt in Schockstarre und verstummt, Marazhai sieht dich dabei an.{/n} "Ich werde umgehend alle Vorbereitungen treffen. Erteilt den Befehl. Wir werden bald ... etwas Unvergessliches erleben."
languages.original_text: {n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Geflüster an Deck hört auf, da Marazhai spöttisch herumschreit:{/n} "Gibt es hier Freiwillige für unser Fest?" {n}Die Crew verfällt in Schockstarre und verstummt, Marazhai sieht dich dabei an.{/n} "Ich werde umgehend alle Vorbereitungen treffen. Erteilt den Befehl. Wir werden bald ... etwas Unvergessliches erleben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デッキでの呟きは、マラズハイの嘲るような叫び声で途切れた。{/n}「それで、我々の宴の最初の一人になってくれる志願者はいるか？」{n}クルーが怯えたように沈黙すると、マラズハイはあなたを見た。{/n}「準備を始めようじゃないか。命令してくれ。俺達は…記憶に刻み込まれるようなことを成すのさ」
languages.original_text: {n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."

traits.locale_text: {n}デッキでの呟きは、マラズハイの嘲るような叫び声で途切れた。{/n}「それで、我々の宴の最初の一人になってくれる志願者はいるか？」{n}クルーが怯えたように沈黙すると、マラズハイはあなたを見た。{/n}「準備を始めようじゃないか。命令してくれ。俺達は…記憶に刻み込まれるようなことを成すのさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Güvertedeki mırıltılar, Marazhai'ın alay dolu haykırışıyla yarıda kesiliyor.{/n} "Ee, ilk ziyafetimiz için gönüllü olmak isteyen var mı?" {n}Mürettebat dehşet içinde sessizliğe bürünürken Marazhai sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ben hazırlıklara başlıyorum. Sen emirleri ver. İkimiz... Unutulmayacak bir şey yaşayacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}The mutters on the deck are cut short by Marazhai's mocking shout:{/n} "So, any volunteers to be the first in our feast?" {n}As the crew fall into a terrified silence, Marazhai looks at you.{/n} "I will start preparing. Give the orders. We are in for... something unforgettable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Güvertedeki mırıltılar, Marazhai'ın alay dolu haykırışıyla yarıda kesiliyor.{/n} "Ee, ilk ziyafetimiz için gönüllü olmak isteyen var mı?" {n}Mürettebat, dehşet içinde bir sessizliğe bürünürken Marazhai sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ben hazırlıklara başlıyorum. Sen emirleri ver. İkimiz... Unutulmayacak bir şey yaşayacağız."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
